project.description: This will deploy the Keycloak Container Image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_NETWORK_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Created Docker Network to connect all containers to. (gobii_net)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The dockerhub user that owns the image repos. (gadm01)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_KEYCLOAK_CONTAINER_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the hostname set for the container internally. (keycloak-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KEYCLOAK_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external port used for the Keycloak Web UI. (8086)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_KEYCLOAK_CONTAINER_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the hostname set for the container internally. (keycloak-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KEYCLOAK_IMAGE_TAG
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the container image tag. (develop_yyyymmdd_build_#)

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: The password used by dockerhub user 'gadmreader' which is a collaborator on the repos owned by 'gadm01'.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the branch being used for the gobii.deploy.keycloak repo. (release/x.y.z) (develop)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#--------------------------------------#
set -e # Abort script at first error set -u # Attempt to use undefined variable outputs error message #set -x # Verbose with commands displayed
#--------------------------------------#
# Run keycloak-node deployment time bash jenkins_deploy/gobii_keycloak_deploy.sh
#--------------------------------------#
echo "Keycloak Deployment Completed!" echo;
